name: Cincinnati-Style Turkey Chili
ingredients: 2 pounds ground turkey or ground beef

instructions.en: Brown the turkey with the onion and garlic in a 4-quart Dutch oven; drain the fat.
instructions.sk: Opečte morčacie mäso s cibuľou a cesnakom v 4-litrovom liatinovom hrnci; zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 4クォートのダッチオーブンで七面鳥のひき肉、玉ねぎ、ニンニクを炒めて茶色くし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Stir in the remaining ingredients; bring to a boil.
instructions.sk: Primiešajte zvyšné ingrediencie; priveďte do varu.
instructions.ja: 残りの材料を加えてかき混ぜ、沸騰させます。

instructions.sk: Prikryte a varte na miernom ohni 1 hodinu.
instructions.ja: 蓋をして1時間煮込みます。

instructions.en: Serve over low carb pasta or just top with cheese and chopped onions, if desired.
instructions.sk: Podávajte na nízkosacharidových cestovinách alebo len posypte syrom a nasekanou cibuľou, ak chcete.
instructions.ja: お好みで低炭水化物パスタの上に盛り付けるか、チーズと刻んだ玉ねぎをトッピングして提供します。

notes: Makes about 6 servings. Can be frozen. Optional toppings of low carb spaghetti, shredded cheddar cheese, and chopped onion are not included in nutritional counts.
